development.//electronDebug: Whether to start the finsemble-electron-adapter in debug mode. Default: true.
development.//breakpointOnStart: Whether to pause finsemble-electron-adapter when it starts. Default: false.

production.//electronDebug: Whether to start the finsemble-electron-adapter in debug mode. Default: true.
production.//breakpointOnStart: Whether to pause finsemble-electron-adapter when it starts. Default: false.
production.//updateUrl: Url to artifacts generated by npm run makeInstaller:prod. The contents of the folder are compared to the user's current installation, and downloaded if they represent a newer version. Default is http://localhost:3375/pkg
production.//chromiumFlags: set a chromium command line flag in Finsemble Electron Adapter
